docs.text: Litmos Reporting Engine This is intended to collect, store, and distribute information about Litmos' Reporting Engine. This documentation is written in Markdown and made into a website using mkdocs . Accessing the Engine To access the engine, begin by navigating to the "Reports" section on the left side of the screen.
docs.title: Litmos Reporting Engine
